Hello, and welcome to the forums! 

26 minutes ago, Zephyer said:

even fins take me 5 minutes to setup on a simple rocket because i have to adjust everything manually to fit properly.   if i just place my mouse over a rocket and place something, it snaps from left to right with no middle.   its bad with the USI kolonization and worse with life support

This feels like probably not quite the right place for this post (the "Technical Support" forum is generally for problems of the "KSP isn't working for me, help me fix my KSP" variety).  It sounds like you're not trying to fix your KSP install, but rather are making some sort of a request.

Can you clarify what exactly it is you're requesting, and from whom?  (Because that affects where is the right place to make the request.)

Are you,

  • reporting a bug in a mod?
  • requesting a feature in a mod?
  • requesting a feature in the stock game?
  • something else?

Can you clarify exactly what your problem is?  Exactly what problem are you experiencing with placing fins?  Is there some reason why "turn on symmetry mode, just put them on" (a couple of mouse clicks, just a few seconds), which is what most KSP players do, isn't working for you?  And what does USI or life support have to do with this?  Those mods do completely different things and don't have anything to do with fin placement, do they?

If you've got a bug report or a feature request for a particular mod, generally the best place to ask is in that mod's thread.

On the other hand, if you've got a feature request for the stock game, then the Suggestions & Development Discussion forum is the place for that.
